description: Try our easy to follow Sticky Asian Pork With Plums recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Sticky Asian Pork With Plums Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Transfer pork to a serving platter with plums, and garnish with coriander. Serve with crackling (see tip) and baby pak choy.
